__e: Boy, I'd sure hate for me to do something like that in front of Ruth and everything.
Well, the story was he had broken up with Ruth, and he came back to see me, to be with me.
Besides, you said you were so interested in Ruths work... and you havent said a word to her all evening.
You love your Aunt Ruth a lot, don't you?
Ruth, don't talk to him about going away.
Its men like you that give men a bad name... and youre darn lucky Ruth doesnt have a big brother... instead of a sister.
- See that Miss Ruth's made comfortable.
- I've gotta see how Ruth is doing.
